reviews.review_msg:
He is great Math prof. His lectures are good and try to attend every lecture as it will help you so much. Grading is easy and fair.
Downside could be: Rarely responds to mails, sometimes notes not given.
Very helpful, need more prof like him for FAN

MM100 is a tutorial class for MATH100 . The first class he did not show up. In the second class duration of 1hour, he came after 35 minutes. Stays in his own world and tries to make students leave class as soon as he can. not very helpful as one should expect from a tutorial class. Bad selection of prof. :(
